synopsis.text:
Kaguya's enchanting melody fills the bustling city of Tokyo, as the Healin' Good Precure team explores the mesmerizing DreamOn experience. This innovative technology, invented by Kaguya's mother, brings people's dreams to life through vivid holographic projections. The Dream Pendants worn by Nodoka and her friends allow them to witness these captivating images, ranging from delightful sweets to lively animals and fish.

As the popular idol Kaguya captivates her audience, her unique ability to sense the unblossomed dreams of her fans becomes apparent. However, the harmony is disrupted when a sinister force known as Ego Ego emerges, intent on stealing the precious dream buds of the concertgoers.

Determined to protect everyone's dreams, the Healin' Good Precure team bravely confronts Ego Ego. In this battle, they find unexpected allies in the Yes! Precure 5 team, who join them in thwarting the malevolent entity. Despite their combined efforts, Ego Ego manages to escape, leaving the Precure teams with a newfound resolve to safeguard the dreams of all.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
